feed.title: Nicholas Piercy
feed.subtitle: Nicholas Piercy's personal website for sharing both personal blogs and professional work.

entry.title: My First Post!
entry.content:
This is my first post by creating a new file from scratch. I am excited to learn how to use Github Pages to create a website that is personal to me.

I plan to use this website both for personal and professional use. I will share publications of mine and my colleagues as well as personal projects and insight into my life outside of academia/work.
entry.summary: This is my first post by creating a new file from scratch. I am excited to learn how to use Github Pages to create a website that is personal to me.
